timeline.message:
Fixed AbstractEntityCitizen never using alternative citizen skins.

Did this by assigning a random texture ID at the same time a citizen gets a name,
gender, etc.

timeline.bodyText: We do need the renderMetadata for things like the logs in the lumberjack backpack, etc.
